Description: Stone funerary stela of Hetose; 13 lines of Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Bierbrier 1994 / Provenances gained and lost (p.66, pl.12d)
Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.8, pl.8)
Revillout 1885 / Les prières pour les morts dans l’épigraphie égyptienne (31 (no.44)) (miscited as EA 408)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 8:3 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2004)
Miscellaneous number: SB Kopt. I 488 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
